attributes.action: suspicious circumstance death in institution's to have police interview suspect
attributes.additional_details:
Make it compulsory for any person who 
Passes away in any institution ( NHS / police custody / carehome )under suspicious circumstances 
To be immediately interviewed by the police 
And be investigated like anyone else would
Be in a murder investigation
attributes.background:
Currently any NHS staff do not get interviewed by the police even if there's
Suspicious circumstances to which the 
Person has died this is a danger to society

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The investigation of deaths is a matter for the coroner and the police.
